metadata.title: CVE-2020-11735 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The private-key operations in ecc.c in wolfSSL before 4.4.0 do not use aconstant-time modular inverse when mapping to affine coordinates, aka a"projective coordinates leak."

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
